name: Firefox Edge (Light & Dark) [FF 56]
description:
The new version of Stylish and Firefox 57 removes the ability of a user-friendly way for distributing and installing browser's UI themes.
On top of that, Firefox 57 comes with a lot of UI changes. And with a theme that consists of ~2700 lines, the sane thing going forward would be to do a complete rewrite of the theme for Firefox 57+. Unfortunately, I don't have nearly enough free time to do that.
So, in combination of the two issues stated above, the theme is discontinued indefinitely.

For anyone who's staying on Firefox 56 - you can still install and use this theme, but you'll need to install Stylish 2.1.1 for it to work.

After installing the theme you might need to restart Firefox to correct any visual bugs.
